args:
Arctos pinpoints Ramona's weak point: She
doesn't completely trust her sisters, and
reduces the level of her heat as a result.
Realizing this, she learns to believe in her
sisters instead of doubting them, which
unleashes the true power of her ability.
Having returned to the Halidom, the blacksmith\nsisters demonstrate their capabilities to Arctos.
Now for the final touch...\nTime to drink your mana!
...That's it, Coach. That's absolutely\neverything we inherited from Dad.
Hmmm, okay. I think I've got a read on\nthings. ...Mostly.
＂Mostly＂? Does this guy really know\nwhat he's doing?
You believe in me, right? In the program?\nThen keep believing to the end!
Right, right. Sure.\nAnyway, what could you tell about us?

Look, this is something ol' Coach can't
just tell ya with words—you gotta
experience it! You gotta experience it
until it's coming outta your PORES!
*huff* *puff* I really fail to understand...\nhow squats...will help our smithing...
Th-this is nothin'... I can keep going...\nIt's the perfect training!
Aaaaand...STOP! But not for long—\nwe're on to part two of the program!
Ack! He's surrounding them with the\nfire from his body!
Uh, Coach? What exactly is the plan here?
FOCUS! KEEP SQUATTING! GO, GO, GO!\nNo smithy worth her salt is afraid\nof a little fire; you have to BE fire!
Hang on, Coach! This training is too much\nfor my sisters!
You don't decide when they're done...\nI DECIDE when they're done!
Are you kiddin' me? Look at 'em!\nThey can barely stand!

THEN THEY BEST BRING THEIR ＂A＂ GAME,
FOR LIMITS ARE MADE TO BE BROKEN!
...Or was all your talk about completing
my program just a buncha hot air?

The greatest smiths keep calm in even
the fieriest of workshops. And there's
no better preparation for that than
some RED-HOT SQUATS!
Ooo, I LIKE the idea of getting better\nby surpassing my limits!
I'll do it, Coach! You're so darn intense\nI can't HELP but do it!
M-me too, Coach... I'm going to push\nmyself even more!
Whoa! Where the hell is THIS\ncomin' from, you guys?

The mind is willing even if the flesh is
wobbly and exhausted from squatting!
Now go, Renee! Go Rena!
COACH BELIEVES IN YOU!
I think the only thing YOU believe\nis that you have to carry the load\nfor your weak sisters.
No, but... That's not... Look, I'm the one\nresponsible for the damn workshop!
I know Dad's last request was that\nhis workshop be entrusted to you.
That's because you inherited the most\nimportant of all his smithing skills:\nthe ability to control a flame's heat.
But this and that are two totally different\nthings, if you ask me!
We all share the workshop—so we have\nto do our part, too. Wouldn't you agree?
Yeah! How can you STILL not believe\nin us after all we've been through?!
I'm gonna beat this heat!\nJust you waaatch!
You're both right. I understand now...\nSo let's get through this program together!
*pant* *pant* W-well, Coach...?\nDid we pass the red-hot squat test?
Pass it? You ladies CRUSHED it!\nNow there's no heat you can't withstand!
Ramona, you've been afraid to let your\nflame go all out because you thought it\nmight hurt your sisters. Ain't that so?
Oh my gosh, rude! SO rude!
Tucker down there, tiger. Now that your\nsister understands there's no I in team,\nshe's free to unleash her full power.
Then let's see it in action, Sis.
(Now it's time to take it up a notch...\nbut if the three of us overcame Coach's\nred-hot squats, we can overcome THIS!)
Arise, O flame! Burn hotter still!
Renee! Let's cool this a bit!
And now the final touch, Rena!
Okay, steel! Time to drink your mana!
Whoa! The heat is so intense, yet you\nthree are smithing like it's nothing!
That's the power of the program—\nAND my red-hot squats!

But a great work ethic means you're the
first in the gym and the last one out,
so your program has only just begun.
FOLLOW COACH, LADIES! TO THE TREES!
Ya wanna go see what happens next,\nboss? It's turnin' into quite the show.
I wouldn't miss this for the world.
